<a id="OpenXRInteractionProfileEditorBase"></a>

# OpenXRInteractionProfileEditorBase

**Inherits:** [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md) **\<** [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [OpenXRInteractionProfileEditor](OpenXRInteractionProfileEditor.md)

Base class for editing interaction profiles.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is a base class for interaction profile editors used by the OpenXR action map editor. It can be used to create bespoke editors for specific interaction profiles.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
